name: Custom Terms of Service - Agree, refresh

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)

inline.description:
With TOS page visible (continuing from MM-T1185):
  1. Click on "I Agree" in the Custom ToS screen
  2. Observe TOS disappears and you see the team
  3. Refresh the page
